Yes, mentioned in the Model S & X but no word yet as an option on the model 3.

I’m sorry about that! I’m super excited about that feature though ,
Quick question it didn't have a charge time on the stats. Did I miss it or was it not mentioned. If so what is it?
1 hr on Supercharger, 7.5-8.5 hrs on Level 2.
One hour from 0% to 100%? What about charge time to add 100 miles to nearly dead battery? That's a more useful metric (It's 20 min on the s)

310 miles, 1 hour to fill, 
20 minutes / 60 minutes = 1/3, 
1/3 * 310 miles = 103 miles.
But that's not how it works. The charge slows down as it gets more charged. It's actually faster to go from 0% to 70% than from 70% to 100%.
Nearly dead battery + 100 miles will be ~15 minutes then. Although it doesn't really follow your anecdote about the s doing it in 20.
